known_issues: App shows 'system not ready yet please wait' message on load

existing_features.title: Fix the ActorGuard component so it does not get stuck showing a 'system not ready yet, please wait' message on load. The component should correctly detect when the backend actor is available and the initialize() call has succeeded (including treating 'already initialized' and 'Unauthorized' responses as ready states), then allow the app to render normally without remaining in a perpetual loading/waiting state.

new_feature_requests.summary: Review the backend main.mo actor initialization logic to ensure the isReady flag is set correctly and that the initialize() function returns an appropriate response that the frontend can detect as a success. Ensure there are no race conditions or stuck states that would prevent the actor from becoming ready.

projectName: Fix 'system not ready yet please wait' loading state
